title: Middle $50\%$ of Baby Weights
question_text: The weights of babies born at a certain large hospital are normally distributed with an average of $7.5\text{ pounds}$ and a standard deviation of $1.25\text{ pounds}$ . What range of weights would put a baby born at this hospital in the middle $50\%$ in terms of weight?

choices.text: Between 3.75 pounds 3.75 pounds and 11.25 pounds 11.25 pounds .
Between 5 pounds 5 pounds and 10 pounds 10 pounds .
Between 6.25 pounds 6.25 pounds and 8.75 pounds 8.75 pounds .
Between 6.4 pounds 6.4 pounds and 8.6 pounds 8.6 pounds .
Between 6.7 pounds 6.7 pounds and 8.3 pounds 8.3 pounds .
